fields.name: Actual_Hours_Plan_to_Complete_Hours__c
fields.label: Actual Hours + Plan to Complete Hours

discovery_conclusions.summary: Comprehensive API discovery completed with 9 API calls. No Risk object is accessible via the current API credentials.
discovery_conclusions.root_cause: The Risk object visible in the Precursive UI (as shown in the screenshot with 'Project Risks' related list and 'Record Type: Risk') is NOT accessible via the current API credentials. This is a Salesforce permissions issue.
evidence: RecordType query returned 0 Risk-related record types (out of 13 total)
Project object has no child relationship to a Risk object
Phase object has no child relationship to a Risk object
Tooling API field search returned 400 error (permission denied)
Only 4 preempt__ objects are accessible vs potentially more in the managed package

current_implementation_status.what_works: Syncing embedded project-level risk via Project_Risk_Level__c and Risk_Description__c fields
current_implementation_status.what_doesnt_work: Syncing individual risk records shown in 'Project Risks' related list

required_actions.action_1: Contact Salesforce Admin to identify the Risk object API name
required_actions.action_2: Grant the Connected App read access to the Risk object
required_actions.action_3: Grant access to the RecordType with DeveloperName containing 'Risk'
required_actions.action_4: Re-run this discovery script to get full Risk schema
required_actions.action_5: Update salesforce_precursive_client.py get_project_risks() to query the Risk object

questions_for_salesforce_admin: What is the API name of the Risk object? (e.g., Risk__c, Project_Risk__c, preempt__Risk__c)
What Permission Set controls access for the PM App Connected App?
Can you add Read access to the Risk object and all its fields?
Is there a 'Risk' Record Type that needs to be made visible?
